events.message: The candidate John Doe submitted an application for the software engineer role with a strong background in Java and cloud technologies.
The application was categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's experience in software development and cloud architecture.
Recruiter Emily was assigned to handle the candidate's recruitment process and coordinate the next steps.
The initial screening call confirmed the candidateâ€™s strong foundation in software engineering principles and enthusiasm for DevOps practices.
John replied promptly, expressing eagerness to proceed with the technical interview and demonstrated availability next week.
A technical interview was scheduled for April 20th to assess coding skills, system design, and cloud infrastructure experience.
